routine.name: Nighttime Fan and Light Off with Ramp Rate
routine.comment: Turn off ceiling fan and dimmer lights with fast off at 23:00 daily; if fan light is on above 0%, ramp down brightness over 1 minute before off.
routine.reasoning: Scheduled nightly off with ramp rate for fan light if it is on.

routine.name: Fan Speed Adjustment on Fan Light Status Change
routine.comment: When ceiling fan light status changes to above 0%, set ceiling fan speed to low; if fan light turns off, turn fan off.
routine.reasoning: Adjust fan speed based on fan light status changes.
